channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: AstraZeneca Is a Cancer Leader. Obesity Could Be a Bonus.
item.description: The Anglo-Swedish drugmaker remains one of the best bets in Big Pharma, and potential success in obesity isn’t priced in to the stock.

item.title: Oil prices edge higher after ending at nearly 2-week low
item.description: Oil futures edged higher Tuesday morning, consolidating after ending the previous session at their lowest since Aug. 6 in response to hopes for a cease-fire between Israel and Hamas as well as concerns over China’s demand for crude.

item.title: The New Onsemi Is Worth Turning Back On
item.description: An auto inventory pileup has dented the chip maker’s valuation, but a new margin structure and AI potential make the stock a worthy bet.

item.title: Harris and Trump promise us many financial benefits, but we need to know the costs
item.description: The Harris economic plan falls short, but Trump hasn’t offered a compelling alternative.

item.title: Elon Musk's Twitter Takeover Is Now the Worst Buyout for Banks Since the Financial Crisis
item.description: Loans of around $13 billion have remained “hung” for nearly two years, bringing in interest payments but weighing on banks’ balance sheets.

item.title: ‘I don’t deserve this’: My abusive son only calls when he wants money. How do I put an end to his bullying and mooching?
item.description: “It’s obvious that he doesn’t need me for anything except money.”

item.title: A Natural-Gas Glut Is Forcing Drillers to Dial Back---Again
item.description: An oversupply of the power-plant fuel persists despite some of the hottest weather on record.

item.title: Nvidia’s earnings could be noisy, but these bulls are still upbeat on the stock
item.description: Analysts are curious about potential shipment delays for the new Blackwell chip but see plenty of reason to cheer Nvidia’s long-term opportunity.

item.title: AMD Deal Shows AI Chip Business Isn't Just About Chips
item.description: The acquisition of ZT Systems brings needed hardware expertise, while divestiture plans should spare AMD a margin hit.

item.title: Paramount’s stock boosted after report Edgar Bronfman Jr. has submitted $4.3 billion offer for Redstone’s National Amusements
item.description: Media executive Edgar Bronfman Jr. has submitted a $4.3 billion offer for National Amusements in an attempt to upend a previous agreement to merge it with David Ellison’s Skydance Media, according to the Wall Street Journal.
